name: Edmonton.py
body:
### Welcome to the Edmonton Python Meetup Group.
Our next meeting is on May 13, 2013 at 6:30pm in the [Startup Edmonton] [1] offices (#301, 10359-104 St).

We meet on the second Monday of each month

If you are coming, please let us know on [Facebook] [3] or [Twitter] [4].

We hope to foster a strong, supportive, and proficient Python community in the Edmonton area. Everyone interested in any aspect of Python development is welcome to join.

Each week we will listen to presentations and discuss Python news and events.

### Past Presentations
Wherever possible, code and slides from past presentations is made available in our [GitHub repository] [2].

### Contacts

You can contact the organizers at organizers@EdmontonPy.com

[1]: http://www.startupedmonton.com                  "Startup Edmonton"
[2]: http://EdmontonPy.com/presentations             "Edmonton.py Presentations"
[3]: https://www.facebook.com/events/148673168640825 "Next Meeting"
[4]: https://twitter.com/EdmontonPy                  "Edmonton.py"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
